rcp1.name: butter_chicken
rcp1.instructions: small chunks of chicken pieces in spicy tomato and onion sauce
rcp1.ingredients: boneless chicken, tomotoes, onion, red chili powder, termeric, cumin seeds, garam masala, chicken masala, oil, salt
